description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

DRG_1.01.description:
- Added yaml option `ap_assignments` to select 4 to 8 assignments required for goal. Each additional assignment adds 14 locations. Changed logic to accommodate this.
- Added yaml option `easy_start`, it adds a secondary weapon, the traversal tool and the special equipment to the start inventory.
- Added yaml option `nitra_remaining`, to switch locations from total Nitra found (resupplies called) to Nitra remaining at the end of the mission.
- Removed "Progressive" from all item names.
- Added secret feature.
DRG_1.01.title: Deep Rock Galactic Manual 1.01

DRG_1.1.2.description:
Update to support new features of Season 5: Drilling Deeper
- 1 mission type
- 2 secondary objectives
- 2 warning mutators
- 2 anomaly mutators
- 3 extermination tasks for short mode

Additional changes:
- small changes in valid ranges for yaml settings
- added deathlink

Uses manual unstable release 20240528.
DRG_1.1.2.title: Deep Rock Galactic Manual 1.1.2

DRG_1.10.description:
Added new game mode. Renamed some yaml options and categories to differentiate between them.
- Choose between short (same options as old version) and long, with the following options: 
- Select the number of missions ("Mining Expedition with Driller" etc.) in the pool, the number of starting missions, the mission completions required to win.
- Add secondary objectives, warning mutators and anomaly mutators to the item- and location pool.
- Choose the number of Deep Dives, Elite Deep Dives, weekly assignments and season challenges
This game mode has no weapons or upgrades to unlock, it behaves similar to muse dash song unlocks. Some locations can be completed at the same time if the in-game missions spawn with the correct modifiers for the received items.
DRG_1.10.title: Deep Rock Galactic Manual 1.10
